name: crypto-forecast-cli
description: Professional crypto forecast CLI tool with advanced technical analysis, trading strategies, and ASCII chart visualization

scripts.btc: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BTC --forecast 10
scripts.eth: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin ETH --forecast 10
scripts.sol: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SOL --forecast 10
scripts.eth-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin ETH --forecast 20
scripts.btc-10: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BTC --forecast 10
scripts.btc-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BTC --forecast 20
scripts.btc-30: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BTC --forecast 30
scripts.sol-10: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SOL --forecast 10
scripts.sol-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SOL --forecast 20
scripts.sol-30: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SOL --forecast 30
scripts.demo: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BTC --forecast 10 --range 90
scripts.pepe: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin PEPE --forecast 10
scripts.pepe-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin PEPE --forecast 20
scripts.floki: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin FLOKI --forecast 10
scripts.shib: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SHIB --forecast 10
scripts.shib-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SHIB --forecast 20
scripts.doge: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin DOGE --forecast 10
scripts.doge-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin DOGE --forecast 20
scripts.bonk: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BONK --forecast 10
scripts.trump: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin TRUMP --forecast 10
scripts.fartcoin: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin FARTCOIN --forecast 10
scripts.sui: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SUI --forecast 10
scripts.sui-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SUI --forecast 20
scripts.sei: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SEI --forecast 10
scripts.sei-20: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SEI --forecast 20
scripts.jup: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin JUP --forecast 10
scripts.snort: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SNORT --forecast 10
scripts.spy: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin SPY --forecast 10
scripts.best: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin BEST --forecast 10
scripts.token6900: npm run build && node dist/index.js --coin TOKEN6900 --forecast 10

author: Crypto Forecast CLI
